question:
I can .... fresher fish there.    a.buying
b.bought
c.buys
d.buy

mohon tolong jawab ya, dan beri penjelasan atau alasan.

yg gk tau gk usah jawab​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

D.

Penjelasan:

Buying adalah pembelian

bought adalah dibeli

buys adalah membeli sama dengan buy tetapi buy adalah simpel past tence

related_questions.question:
19. Indri    Sinta : Today is September 9.
Indri : I see, thanks
a. What day is it today? c. Is today the September 9?
b. What date is it today? d. When will we leave?​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

B. What date is it today?

Penjelasan: Date biasa digunakan jika jawaban memiliki angka seperti: Desember 4

Day biasa digunakan jika jawaban hanya memiliki hari tidak ada angka seperti: Friday

Jawaban:

a. What day is it today?

related_questions.question:
11.Nanda and her brother ... at five o'clock every morning.    a. woke up
b. wake up
c. waking up
12. The students ... study online in 2019.
a. Do not
b. did not
c. were not
13. Junercho ... the film until 10 pm every night
a. Watches
b. watch
C. watched
14. Dewa wanted to be a teacher when he ... a child.
b. do
c. am
15. Does your father ... to work early in the morning?
a. go
b. went
C. gone
16.Tiger and lion ... the heaviest land animal.
a. is not
b. are not
C. do not
a. was​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

11. B. Wake up.

12. A. Do not.

13. A. Watches.

14. Was.

15. A. Go.

16. B. Are not.

Penjelasan:

Nomor 11-16 menggunakan kalimat Simple Present Tense, kecuali nomor 14 menggunakan kalimat Simple Past Tense.

Semoga membantu ^_^

related_questions.question: The shop...late yesterday a. closed B. close C closes d. closing​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

a. closed

Penjelasan:

Kenapa yang closed? Karena disitu udah ada kata yesterday yang dimana artinya kemarin sehingga harus menggunakan Past Tense yang dimana past tense ini verbnya (kata kerja) menggunakan bentuk kedua.
